description:
The National Suicide Prevention Lifeline-u00c6s mission is to provide immediate assistance to individuals in suicidal crisis by connecting them to the nearest available suicide prevention and mental health service provider through a toll-free telephone number: 1-800-273-TALK (8255). It is the only national suicide prevention and intervention telephone resource funded by the Federal Government.

###COL###
###MON###
name: NATIONAL SUICIDE PREVENTION LIFELINE
